travel_instructions.estimated_travel_time: approximately 10 hours and 30 minutes to 12 hours, depending on the route and layovers
travel_instructions.route_details: From Ahmedabad, take a flight from Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel International Airport (AMD) to one of Italy's major airports, such as Rome's Leonardo da Vinci–Fiumicino Airport (FCO) or Milan's Malpensa Airport (MXP), with possible layovers in cities like Dubai, Abu Dhabi, or Istanbul.
